Title: Admin can view all products with inventory status
Description: Verify that an authenticated admin user can access the product management interface and view all products, including detailed information and inventory status.
AcceptanceCriteria: Admin sees a list of all products with details (name, description, price, category, images, inventory status)

SwaggerMapping.Summary: Get all products with details and inventory status

Positive: Admin user receives complete product list with all expected fields
Negative: Non-admin user should be denied access
Admin with expired session receives authentication error
Edge: No products exist: interface shows empty state
Boundary: Large product catalog (>1000 products) loads successfully
Security: Verify access control for admin role
Performance: Response time for product list retrieval is <2s for 1000+ products

Title: Admin can add a new product
Description: Verify that an admin can create a new product by submitting valid product details and the product is saved and appears in the catalog.
AcceptanceCriteria: Admin submits product details (name, description, price, category, images)
Positive: Valid product data results in successful creation
Negative: Missing required fields (name, price) results in validation error
Invalid price (negative value) results in error
Security: Verify only admins can add products
Check for SQL injection in text fields

Title: Admin can update existing product details
Description: Verify that an admin can update product information and changes are reflected in the database and catalog immediately.
AcceptanceCriteria: Admin selects a product and modifies details
Changes are saved and visible instantly
Negative: Missing required fields returns validation error
Boundary: Update price to lowest/highest allowed value

Title: Admin can delete a product
Description: Verify that an admin can delete a product, marking it as inactive or removing it from the database, and it no longer appears in customer searches.
AcceptanceCriteria: Product is marked inactive or removed
Product does not appear in customer searches
Positive: Product is removed or marked inactive successfully
Negative: Attempt to delete already inactive product returns appropriate message
Edge: Delete product with maximum linked inventory

Title: Admin can update inventory levels
Description: Verify that an admin can update inventory levels for a product, and the new quantity is saved and product availability is updated.
Negative: Negative inventory value returns validation error
Boundary: Update inventory to maximum allowed value
